title: Our Offers
description: The FAIR cookbook contains everything you need to get started. Select from a variety of resources, aiming at different user personas.

content.title: For Managers
content.description: You have data. You know that FAIR is for Findable, Accesible, Interoperable, Reusable. You want quick solutions. Learn about success paths right now.

content.title: For Developers
content.description: You have a task. You have to create an app that complies with the FAIR principles. But what's that even supposed to mean? The FAIR cookbook provides you with guidelines.

content.title: For Data Mungers
content.description: You have to make that data FAIR. Unfortunately, it comes in form of a database dump, a heap of Excel sheets, or is scattered across an USB drive. Learn how to tackle each of these challenges in the most effective way.

content.title: For Learners
content.description: You want to deep-dive into the FAIR cosmos. What tools are there? What technologies? You will love our ingredient descriptions.
